title: How do I assign a unique ringtone for a contact on Ascend Mate2?
answer:
Step 1:  Under contact details screen, select arrow under "**Ringtone**" 

 Step 2:  On the "**Select Ringtones**" screen, select the ringtone 

 Step 3:  Select "**Apply**" 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=38971)
keywords: ringtone, Ascend, Mate2, Mate 2, assign contact
